website_summaries.verdict: The richly-hued Sunbrella adjusts to provide shade wherever you need, while well-placed vents let cool breezes through. Fade-resistant fabric keeps it looking new while blocking UV rays.
pros: Crank to open and adjust using push button
Vented to help cool air circulate
cons: Gusty winds occasionally snap this umbrella at the adjustment point if left open

customer_reviews.title: Last one lasted 5 years
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good but we just got it. Our last umbrella survived 5 years so we will have to wait and see if this one does as well. Seems sturdy and works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third umbrella we’ve bought from them. The yellow adds so much color to the backyard and the quality is outstanding! Previously purchased two red ones for another home and there withstood all of the weather and never faded. Will be buying these for our backyards at all of our future homes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation .
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for keep out the sunshine and colorful umbrella and easy to operation ,I would recommend this one umbrella. This one have more color ,you can choose your color,.Shading effect is ok .
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Scales

customer_reviews.title: Nice large umbrella, sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the umbrellas for the pool. They are sturdy and stand up in the Las Vegas winds. I will re-review about the fading of the fabric. I bought these because they are Sunbrella brand. But very Happy with them so far. Update: it's been a year since I bought these and the color is still fresh and dark navy blue. Still work and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Strong Spokes, & Fabric Material
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised by the strong spokes of this Patio Outdoor Table Umbrella. The crank to open or close this Umbrella is very smooth and very easy to use. The fabric material used for this Umbrella seems to be good, or is at least better than what we had before. We also really like the air ventilation, as it has been allowing the hot air to vent out of the center of this Outdoor Umbrella. The 9 ft coverage, and the adjustment of the positioning of the direction of this Outdoor Umbrella was what attracted us to this Outdoor Umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has beefier canopy supports than is typical, and they're rectangular. The plastic housing around the crank is slender compared to other umbrellas. In my constrained quarters I like having an old-style manual tilt control rather than automatic upon full canopy extension. I wish Sunbrella fabric wasn't so expensive, yet the $160 price I paid compared well to a number of competing similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Windrum

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color and lots of shade
customer_reviews.text: Our patio get full afternoon sun - brilliant, hot sun nearly every day. This 9' umbrella shades a large section of the french doors and windows and drops the temperature dramatically. Before getting it, the door knobs would get almost too hot to touch. This kind of exposure requires a high quality fabric. Very pleased with how it handles wind, the rare rain we get, and the tilt allow us to keep sun off the house all afternoon and reduces our AC use.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Allows a breeze to get through the top with great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: We like the stylish look, but love the fact that we can enjoy our outdoor space in the heat of the day now.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I have had this umbrella for exactly 1 month. Yesterday out at the pool with the family and had this umbrella and 4 others up. A very light gust came up and the metal snapped where the tilt mechanism is and the umbrella collapsed. The other 4 umbrellas did't budge and cost less than half of this one. Made of cheap pot metal and very thin aluminum spars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product but is it Sunbrella®️ Fabric?
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up. Appears to be a good value for money. Replacing a Treasure Garden umbrella with Sunbrella®️ fabric. My concern is that the last 3 umbrella canopies I’ve purchased with Sunbrella®️ fabric had “Authentic Sunbrella®️ fabric” tags sewn into the canopies. This product does not, making me question the authenticity of the claim. Perhaps the distributor/manufacturer can chime-in?!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Zillman

customer_reviews.title: The worst umbrella we’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a negative review but this is the worst umbrella we have ever had. It’s not sturdy. The crank is insanely difficult to get up and down. The tilt only works if you’re willing for it to twirl around with the slightest breeze. The material is cheap and is ripped in places after 1 month. I usually spend between 120-250 every 2 years for an umbrella and have never had a problem. This is by far the absolute worst one and we are just trying to get through the summer with it so it doesn’t feel like a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Check diameter at top of your pole where you are going to attach the new cover..
customer_reviews.text: Very good price. Loved the bright red color. Fabric is not as heavy duty as my previous cover which has lasted around 7 years in California sun. However, the low price compensates. One thing you need to do is take your old cover off first to check the diameter of the spot where it fits at the top. The hole was way to small for mine. I had to wrestle the ring off, glue my old ring on in order to screw the top on. Would be helpful if that information was in the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Barry T.

customer_reviews.title: Robust materials, Well made
customer_reviews.text: I have a very well made 9 foot, eight vane umbrella. The canopy gave out. I ordered another model from another retailer. It was 8 foot, six vane and made of thin material. I decided to look for just the canopy replacement and found this. The canopy installs quite easily and is a match for the one it replaced. Like everyone says, the grommet hole at the top is too small allow the screw cap to fit, but I found a hose fitting that screwed into the post, drilled the cap and bolted the cap through the grommet to the post. Perfect. I will buy again. The other umbrella is going to my daughter's.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. stewart

customer_reviews.title: First time bad experience!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my friend looking for the better umbrella for our birthday party. We have an idea celebrate our birthday in FL beach 🏖. But I have been extremely dissatisfied with this umbrella. The fabric is very thin, during a 25mph wind looks like going to break. And also can’t stand properly, ended up we decided to folded it up. Only for decoration during the party. May be only good for the backyard not beach. Definitely Would not order it again and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bowen C

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but grommet was small , cut it out and used it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality umbrella cover. I did almost send it back when I realized the grommet that goes on the top of my umbrella frame was too small. After looking over my frame I realized if I just cut the grommet out the top screw on cover would hide it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I need help and a refund
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived broken in pieces. I cannot even lift it much less take it to that store which we don’t even have in our area with my handicap!!!! I want a refund for it. Impossible to return! The box was a mess. I liked the product and ordered another one just like it that arrived in good condition. Please look into this. I saved the ok box from the new order just Incase you can pick it up off my door step and return it to your refund department to see that I am not lying. Let me know what you will do to help me get that refund.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: I question if this is truly Sunbrella fabric?
customer_reviews.text: I paid a premium price in order to get an umbrella made from Sunbrella fabric because it is known for it's durability. The umbrella arrived today and there is not a Sunbrella label anywhere on the packaging or the umbrella itself. In my experience, Sunbrella cushions and other outdoor times come with a Sunbrella tag attached so you know they are made with authentic Sunbrella material. Did I get ripped off? I guess only time will tell if the fabric does not hold up or fades. I used it this afternoon in our pool and the crank mechanism performed fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Payne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 5 of these umbrellas for my restaurant patio. 2 of them didn't last a month and only one is functional (bought them in September I believe). The only reason one is left is that we closed it up so it wouldn't break. The lever part of the umbrella near the top is what breaks and believe it doesn't take much. These umbrellas took almost no use except for very light wind and opening and closing them. If you buy these you will be dissapointed. Don't say I didn't warn you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This weight (not really a stand) broke immediately the first time I opened the umbrella I put in it. Umbrella was loose and wobbly so I turned it to try and tighten it and the base split in two. It must be made of plaster. No stars isn't a choice but it should be. This is now heavy garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mijorn Ollikainen

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Sunbrella fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I was willing to pay this price to replace an umbrella made of Sunbrella fabric that had lasted for over 10 years. I received this EliteShade umbrella today and could immediately tell this is NOT made of Sunbrella fabric. There is no Sunbrella label sown into the fabric and it is clearly cheap canvas. I put it back in the box and returned it the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Schmankman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the color was too dark for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice umbrella.. I have had these Sunbrella umbrellas in the pass and they last forever. The previous one I had lasted five years. The reason I got rid of it is I was lazy and didn't feel like cleaning it and I was just in the mood for something new. Being honest. I sent this one back because the color wasn't on target of what I needed. I needed a lighter color in this was much darker. Almost like a dark bluish green. It is definitely not a light color. I sent this back mainly because I needed an 11-foot umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. One of them came with the bottom of the pole bent. My husband had to use pliers to fix it, and then it would fit on to the extension pole. The 2nd umbrella was fine. These are very large, sturdy, provide lots of shade. I purchased the tan/sand color. These are made of Sunbrella fabric, and we have had many things in this material and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: NOT Sunbrella!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT SUNBRELLA FABRIC - false advertising and Amazon should correct or remove from their site. Fulfilled by Amazon, so they are also accountable. Not a good price for a knock-off product - look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: VM120

customer_reviews.title: Broken and inconsistent manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered 3 of these as a trial with the intent of purchasing at least 9 more but this first 3 had some significant manufacturing issues. None of them were the same as the other. 1 pole was thicker in diameter than the other, 1 didn’t have a threaded hole on the top to put the circle cap on the other one didn’t have the opening rope attached to the umbrella. I’ve never seen such inconsistencies in a product in my life. If you are the manufacturer, please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice navy color
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived as expected. I would have given 5 stars, but the 'tilt' was extremely difficult to operate and no "helpful hints" were included in the box letting us know to slightly loosen the screw near the tilt to make it easier. It also squeaks really bad when using the crank to put down the umbrella. We hope this will go away over time. The cost was high compared to Costco, but being umbrellas are not in season again until March (we bought in early Sept), Amazon was our only option.
customer_reviews.author: titen0511

customer_reviews.title: Broke, but was replaced.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought in late August, the color was exactly what I hoped it would be. For my table/6 chairs nicely. Provided nice shade. A month later it snapped. It wasn’t a windy day... it just broke where the tilt is (I never used the tilt). I emailed customer service and they were great. They shipped me a replacement and provided an apology. There are so many great reviews that I suspect I just had a lemon. I didn’t give 5 stars due to the original product breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: Get the straight pole. Although the tilting pole is convenient. Over time the joint at the pivot button gets loose and it leans.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking, although I am not sure this is Sunbrella fabric, the metal post is thin and scratches easily, the weak point is the string that is used to crank it up, it slipped through the guid hole the second time I raised it, so I hade to thread it back through and tie a bigger not. Lesson here is, a good one will cost you twice as much as this and I’m not sure if this is Sunbrella Brand fabric. Take it with a grain of salt. It looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Murphy

customer_reviews.title: SHADY SUNBRELLA
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The material seems much lighter than the previous Sunbrella that I was used to. Happy it has the tilt crank option. It's what my old umbrella had. Found it helpful. The color is light and clean and just goes pretty well with the patio set we have. Couldn't find the exact same one I'd purchased years earlier in the color or style. So this was a good second choice. Enjoying it. Great price. Sprayed it with a protector. Hoping it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mercie

customer_reviews.title: Second time is the Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and liked it! It cranked out easily and the tilt button worked fine...however, when we went to crank it back down, it was very difficult (impossible) to crank it back down and sounded like the plastic housing was going to break. We had to push on the umbrella to even get it to come down. So, we sent it back and asked for a replacement! Like night and day! Just got the new one. It works like a charm! Like the material, and crank works perfectly in both directions!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmamutti

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Umbrella but defective crank.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this patio umbrella for our pool area couple of days ago. Price,color and construction material is great. I encountered problem with the crank. Very stiff to turn and awful screech/grinding noise, especially when I tried to close the umbrella. Tried Silicone spray w/o any result. I am afraid that the gears will break or totally freeze. Had to return. Thanks to Amazon's excellent return policy.
customer_reviews.author: urodoc45

customer_reviews.title: bad service and bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I had placed order on Feb 19, Five days past, It is still did not shippiing yet, So I had send request to cancel the order before they shipping, It had been rejected, and It is take 9 days finally arrived, the fiber of umbrella is not the good quality and compare with my real sun umbrelle fiber, it is very cheap material made. Very disappointed and never buy it .
customer_reviews.author: Sunny beach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: This seller is amazing in terms of customer support. The rod on my umbrella broke after 1 year and very likely due to wind damage. I emailed the seller about this and without asking too many questions, the seller offered to replace the rods and sent it to me promptly. Additionally, the seller also included a return label for the umbrella. I love the product so far even after i year of use and I highly recommend the seller! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem with the rope first time opening
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella. We put it up on our deck today for the first time. Rope was not on right so we finally got it to open and looked nice. Went back out to close it before night fall, nothing happened handle just kept turning and will not close. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous but hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Love the deep blue color, easy to open, very very difficult to close. I hope I don't break the umbrella trying to close it. Might have to crack it open to see what's going on with the inside mechanisms because it doesn't make sense that it's hard to close but do easy to open. Otherwise could have easily been a 5 star fabulous umbrella. Instead it's a three because it's so hard to close.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: After just one month - it won't open and close!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect - but what good does that do now that we can't open & close the umbrella! This was NOT a cheap product because of the Sunbrella material .
customer_reviews.author: Crae C.

customer_reviews.title: One was bad and they took care of it - Great Umbrellas, Great company to work with
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, the first one was great. The fabric is nice and sturdy. It opened and closed without an issue. We did not put the second one out for 5-6 weeks. I immediately realized there was an issue with the handle, when I went to close it. I notified the company and they took care of it. Excellent customer service and I would highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The material was nylon I believe, not a light canvass. The craftsmanship was poor. The umbrella did not tension across the ribs. the slots at the end of each rib did not tuck in very well at all. The metal pin hole at the top of the umbrella was not large enough to take the slot at the top of the umbrella. Therefore, I could not attach the top of the umbrella. Poor design, construction, and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for our bacckyard
customer_reviews.text: I bought three umbrellas and I am very happy with them. The color selection is great. It took less than five minutes to put everything together. There is a winding handle to open or close the umbrellas and a built in tie for when the umbrellas are down. I have had Sunbrella brand patio pads before and they are still very nice after nine years in the Arizona sun. Buy these umbrellas, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Crank broke soon after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: For the first few days, this umbrella was great! But within only a few weeks of use the crank mechanism to lower the umbrella began to click and skip. Now it's impossible to close the umbrella completely. I either got a defective umbrella or the crank parts for this brand of umbrella are very poor quality. Either way, I spent too much money for this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Moirne

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 uses (but customer service is great)
customer_reviews.text: 6/20/2020: Used this about 10 times and the crank broke. It's useless now. Contacted customer support. I will update this review if it gets resolved. 6/28/2020: customer support has replied to my email and agreed to send a new frame replacement! Will update again when I receive the product. Great customer service so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Material is thin but price is right and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It fit just right and looks great. Really haven't had a chance to use it much because the weather turned cold. I would have given it a 5 but the first thing I noticed is that you can see the sun through it. Not sure how that is going to provide the protection we need. With that said the price was right. Also had to cut out the center hole in make it fit. No big deal because I had read the other reviews with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Cranky
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these and the crank on one of them came apart on the first day and the other one was hard to crank, so we returned them both. They were pretty pricey and that was disappointing. The red sunbrella material is rich looking and beautiful and we really wanted to keep them but those cranks ruined it for us.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Higbee

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest disappointment in these umbrellas is the fact that they are easy to assemble and crank up. The bad part is bringing them back down. One is harder than the other to crank in, it is so stiff, I am really afraid of something snapping. Does anyone have some advice? I thought it would get easier with time but it has not so far. As far as looks and sturdiness, they get 5 stars. It's just the taking them down part.
customer_reviews.author: dominic

customer_reviews.title: The mechanics of the umbrella are of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Within the first minute of opening up the umbrella I realized that the automatic tilt doesn't Work. When the umbrella was fully open the mechanics seem to be a loose/shakey. Two days later one of the screws popped out where the arms join, and there was no way to make the screw stay when put back.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Defective umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and went up easily Unfortunately I can’t bring it down It cranks up smoothly but doesn’t come down It is stuck What shall I do? I cant even repack it for returning
customer_reviews.author: wysiwyg1946

customer_reviews.title: Big shade & good value.
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good. The crank action is smooth. Sturdy fabric that seems to be sewn well. Only potential criticism so far is that the tilt point is quite far up the pole. In my umbrella stand (maybe this adds a little height) and at 5'6" I have quite a stretch to reach the tilt point.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah N.

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like This Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I really like his umbrella. Many you see around have very flimsy looking cloth, no so with this model. The material is thick and appears to be high quality to the eye. It also has a five year fade guarantee which is reassuring. The powder coated metal also looks to be of good quality. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Farmguy

customer_reviews.title: Crank/tilt disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We bought two umbrellas and after searching high and low for Navy with Sunbrella fabric, settled on this one. We opted to forego the LED light option and I guess didn’t notice the automatic tilt wasn’t included. It is very difficult to tilt by hand, and honestly wish we got that feature even though it was even more expensive. Also, the crank itself is easy when opening, but one umbrella is extremely difficult to close, I feel like it may break quickly, so try not to open and close often. They seem solid and the Sunbrella fabric is why we chose this, but the crank/tilt features are disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HeyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrellas - good quality fabric and sturdy to the wind.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrellas and well built. Sturdy to the wind and are showing no signs of fading (purchased navy 2 months ago). I liked the first one so much, I bought two more. One of the two new ones is tough to crank closed, but it’s not a big enough issue to return or anything.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great pool umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: My rottweilers and I wanted an umbrella for our Rottie/ pool/ she cave. We chose the Elite Shade sunbrella, in royal blue. It is perfect! We love the color; well-made; durable, and blocks the sun. The girls and I give this umbrella- 4 Paws & 2 Thumbs Up!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lee Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was a replacement for one purchased last year. I never paid attention to the pole and thought as long as the umbrella keeps the sun out it is fine. Our umbrella pole snapped into two, so when I purchased the new umbrella I looked specifically for strength and quality. This umbrella has a metal pole and is not flimsy, able to handle gusts of wind thanks to the vented material at top. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Sunbrella? Not
customer_reviews.text: There is no evidence other than the sales pitch here that this is Sunbrella fabric. We waited too long to open it, and had discarded the packing material or we would return it. We have other Sunbrella trademarked items, so we know what to look for. Umbrella was no problem to assemble, but crank opener does not smoothly operate. Only time will tell if this umbrella will last. Buyer beware. You can buy similar quality for 1/4th the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oza Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Subpar quality assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed with this umbrella. First, I ordered rust and was sent red. Second, after putting it on my existing frame, the wind blew and two pockets tore. I had to take it down and sew them back together and reinforced the other six pockets.
customer_reviews.author: libby497

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: After ~10 years with a similar umbrella--not a Sunbrella--we had to replace it. After careful reviews and vetting of umbrellas--we purchased this one. It appears as good as and better than my old one--fabric quality, ease of use, inside ribbing, etc. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: already like it!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my usual non-Sunbrella material I can already tell the construction and thickness of material is far superior to the ones I have been buying. I'll add to this after a few months to let you know how the construction stands up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Paivanas

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this one out based on cost but still having sunbrella fabric. The metal post seems sturdy and can seperate so you can leave your bottom section of the pole in your base but still take the umbrella in during weather. Material has proven sturdy and water proof during a light rain and kept our table dry.
customer_reviews.author: William Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella works as intended. Need to pair it with a base as it doesn't come with one. Open and closing with the crank is straightforward. Doesn't look like it would break easily but not the heaviest patio umbrella I've dealt with..
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Easy and inexpensive upgrade to my existing umbrella pole
customer_reviews.text: I've always replaced the entire umbrella - canvas and pole after the canvas part would fade - but decided to try replacing just the canvas / canopy part this time. Well after measuring (which was easy) and being sure I ordered the right size, it worked out beautifully. My husband and I laid it out on the lawn and had it installed in a few minutes - and it looks great, fits great - very happy with it, especially with the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Good

customer_reviews.title: Terrible crank.
customer_reviews.text: The crank handle is terrible! It is placed too far up the pole and to lower the umbrella is very difficult and feels like the rope will break at any moment! I saw similar reviews but took a chance anyway. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but problem with pole
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking patio umbrella. For a smaller patio I would not go with a 9' Umbrella next time. 8' would be about right but live and learn. You don't want to go cheap for something that is outside all year here in San Diego. After less than six months the metal pole snapped in half from wind. I couldn't figure out how to contact anyone at Amazon so I emailed the manufacturer directly. They were very courteous and shipped a free new pole within a few days to my home. Things happen but the seller took good care of me.
customer_reviews.author: glenn d. shuster

customer_reviews.title: good umbrella with great fabric
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this umbrella for the fabric. We live in a windy, hot and sunny area and have seen what those elements can do to polyester versions. We're hoping this one stands up to its' 5 year sun-fade warranty. The bright green is really cheerful next to all my cedar furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Lights

customer_reviews.title: Missing 2 component pieces
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and planned on putting it together tonight. Unfortunately I'm missing 2 pieces. It looks good enough and it is heavy as advertised. But it is too bsd tgat i now gave to deal with the vendor to get the missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to measure the hole in the top of your umbrella to accommodate a finial, if your umbrella has one
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Janiszewski

customer_reviews.title: NOT Sunbrella Fabric
customer_reviews.text: Not even close. This is just a regular market umbrella with regular fabric.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Received it with a hole, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with a hole in it. Would not recommend it. Then received a replacement and the replacement broke in less than 2 months of using it. The rope that attaches to the crank arm broke and stopped being able to open up the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: We had an umbrella from the same manufacturer which didn't completely block the sun. This one does that and is slightly wider as well. Was extremely pleased with this purchase despite a slight delay in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Kopilak

customer_reviews.title: Quality does not match the price.
customer_reviews.text: For over $200, I expect quality. The crank handle, housing and umbrella spokes are all plastic. They were flimsy and cheap. I put up the umbrella & then immediately took it down & repackaged it. I will look elsewhere. I have ordered other umbrellas in the past for a similar price & the quality was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a couple of weeks, so I can't speak to its durability. But its very attractive, well made, easy to put up, and seems very sturdy. And MUCH cheaper than the pottery barn ones we used to get.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel T. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Like the umbrella...but..
customer_reviews.text: Color is beautiful and it seems to be very sturdy compared to other umbrellas I’ve had over the years. My complaint is with the cranking mechanism. It catches every time I close it, about midway down, something catches, and I have to kind of jiggle around the umbrella and it finally drops a bit and then allows me to finish closing it. Really like this umbrella, just wish I didn’t have an issue with it so early on, especially with the price
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I saw how light the construction is on this umbrella. The first time we tried to fold it up, one of the struts broke. Sorry, about that. Anyway, I found a better umbrella for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Headed South

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and extremely attractive umbrella that fit directly into our existing table and base. It was very well packaged and while we had a fairly long wait it was certainly worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Breen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well.  Some assembly.  Drill a hole in the bottom to drain water!
customer_reviews.text: Nice beefy heavy stand that looks good and holds up to our local gales. My only suggestion is to drill a hole in the bottom of the shaft to drain out rainwater. Our was filling up and creating some rust spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kontoboy

customer_reviews.title: Second one, really love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this umbrella for 3 years. It is still like new. Frame is strong, made of aluminum, rust free. The fabric didn't fade, pretty much like new. I had several umbrellas, all of them faded in a month. That is why i stopped buying those cheap ones. The umbrella is not cheap, but you will find very penny you spend worth it. I bought another one for my new table. You will never disappointed with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised
customer_reviews.text: Really nice good quality umbrella. I am very surprised by how nice this is. I ordered the navy and it is a very deep true rich navy color. It seems like it is well made, so far. Order this
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's a thing of beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor table umbrella is a great product. It works great. Beautiful color and easy to use. The cranking mechanism works great.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cj Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Classy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same umbrella 7 years ago when I got this house and they held up for the 7 years pretty much didn't fade or anything only reason I replaced them is because the handle on one broke and the other 1 had too much bird poop on it
customer_reviews.author: cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for old, faded umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Just put this away for the winter. When I got it, I sprayed it with a water repellent; it lasted through huge rainstorms and hot sunshine. I took the old one off it's frame and replaced it with this beauty. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: A great solution for a faded umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Almost exactly as I'd hoped. I didn't anticipate that there wouldn't be a hole for my umbrella topper, but it was easily remedied with scissors. Hoping the color will last longer than it's predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to crank
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. However, it is very difficult to turn the crank to raise and lower the umbrella. Will most likely return for a product from another vendor
customer_reviews.author: yrekabaker

customer_reviews.title: NOT Sunbrella fabric
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is ok. But I bought it because it said Sunbrella fabric. There is no Sunbrella tag which is on ALL their products and the fabric has already started to fade in places after only one month.
customer_reviews.author: Tenniscook

customer_reviews.title: Ok; time will tell! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about it being Su Brella fabric for the price. I was thinking it would be rectangular because it was called a market umbrella. I will post again in a couple years and let you know how colorfast it is. The ad was clear it was a 9’ umbrella so my hope that it was bigger was just that. It seems ok. And if is really Su nBrella fabric and is as colorfast as the one I’ve had for four years or so it was still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Royal Blue Sunbrella is Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this umbrella. It is easy to operate and works as promised. I especially love the beautiful Royal Blue color I ordered. It seems to be very sturdy, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane MC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy looks amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy looks amazing for the price! Only thing I wish it had was LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: ficklepearl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price - returned!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this for lots of reasons. I do not feel the quality is worth the price. It would be understandable if I only paid $50, not $150. The very first time I opened it, the rope snapped out of the mechanism. After lots of attempts, we finally got it back in place and tied it through a metal nut to keep it in place. When tilted, it spins around and around at the slightest breeze. I also do not think it was Sunbrella fabric and I’m shocked that Sunbrella allows this listing to claim it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elite Shade Sunbrella Review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the very beginning of July and received a total of 3 updates of which each put the delivery out another week. I finally cancelled the order and reordered on August 21 with an expected delivery date of August 23. No problem with delivery this time. No idea why the first order was so messed up. I do like the umbrella but feel it was a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Noll

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: These went together well. Only issue I have with them is bringing the umbrella down is very hard and I think it would be almost impossible for an elderly person to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Higgs

customer_reviews.title: very nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our deck. Cranks up easily. Tilt is nice and of course the Sunbrella fabric will last (20 years+ experience with it on boat covers)
customer_reviews.author: Bronk

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, the material is thick, easy to turn handles would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup. Qulity is good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated, looks good, we have had some wind and I forgot to roll it down and it withstood the wind, no broken arms. I love the crank out and that it has the ability to ""break"" so you can angle it for better sun coverage. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD V. AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Heavy, Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Use this to hold a large folding shade umbrella. It is very stable, reasonably priced and a nice neutral color. The bottom appears to be treated to resist rusting, we'll see. Happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miffy

customer_reviews.title: Patio Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful forest green color and generous size for optimal shade. The Sunbrella fabric shows no sign of fading or mildew despite exposure to a variety of weather conditions. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: beautiful  yellow colored umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: light weight material but sunbrella so should last!! sturdy umbrella, poles etc. I do think overpriced but I wanted this color now sooo all good
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Budde

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this umbrella. I usually get the cheapest umbrella, it fades, makes me sad and I resort to buying another. This one looks as it will last, the material quality is great, it is thick and really brightly colored. It will however have to tolerate the texas sun so time will tell. The mechanism seems ok, I always worry that these things will break but again so far so good. Overall I think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TTTexas

customer_reviews.title: This company has great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is sturdy and has not faded after two very hot summers in Texas. This summer our umbrella tipped over from a very high unexpected wind gust. The middle portion with the rotating handle split. This company sent me a new middle portion for free. I will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mayfield III

customer_reviews.title: Quality umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this umbrella. The first one was destroyed in a wind storm. I've found them to be good quality and come in a large variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carol Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Great color, size, quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about whether the color would be what I was looking for but i was pleasantly surprised. It goes very well with my patio chairs. The size was just what I needed for my table and it fits the space where my table sits perfectly! The sunbrella fabric is great. A very nice umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Mawmaw

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: All went well at the beginning. Pretty enough. Everything worked. But then... One rough wind and it got knocked down. Obviously the base was the problem. Not the umbrella. But the umbrella bent like it was made of gum.
customer_reviews.author: JJCM

customer_reviews.title: Quality Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Living in the south with heat and sun the Sunbrella fabric and sturdiness of the frame (wind gusts) were of paramount importance. The umbrella has an easy to use crank feature. This was a gift to my sister who has arthritis so ease of operation was mandatory.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: Recently had a outdoor patio space built. Needed a umbrella that covered a nice sized space but also Chic and Sturdy . Very Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.author: UNCLE SOUTH

product_meta.title: EliteShade Sunbrella 9Ft Market Umbrella Patio Outdoor Table Umbrella with Ventilation and 5 Years Non-Fading Top,Red
product_meta.description: Color:Red9ft Patio Umbrella Outdoor Table Market Umbrella with Push Button Tilt and Crank System, easy to open and close. Ideal for both residential and commercial uses.
feature_bullets: Sunbrella Performance Fabric: 100% solution-dyed acrylic, 5 years non-fading top, water resistance, mildew resistance and oil resistance. Ordinary market and patio umbrella will fade in one month, while EliteShade umbrella is fadeproof.
Skin Protection: The Skin Cancer Foundation recommends Sunbrella fabrics in shading products as a part of a complete sun protection regimen to aid in preventing sun-induced skin damage.

Full Aluminum Umbrella Frame: EliteShade patio umbrella is 20% stronger than most of patio umbrellas in the market. The 9ft Patio umbrella comes with 1.5 inches diameter aluminum pole which provides stronger support than standard round poles. Rust Free Powder Coated with 8 Ribs.
Crank Open System: EliteShade patio umbrella is easy to open and close by the crank handle. You can press the push button to tilt it according the sun position.
The umbrella base is not included. Search B07VXLFGGW, B07X24LK86, B07TYL67Q1, B07X4Z7JCP, B07TW4YHQP, B07TW4BF2K, B081N7Z664, B07V1TW6M2 for the umbrella base you might need.
